Desc.entry: Charitable organisation ims to improve the relationships and sex education of all young people by supporting and teaching parents and carers in their role as relationship and sex educators. Offers one-off sessions and four-week courses to enable parents and carers to talk to children more effectively about sex and relationships. Training is also available by request for organisations and professionals. Also runs information stalls at healthy schools events and presentations at PHSE (Personal Health and Social Education) workshops. Self or any referral.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Various venues and times, please contact for details
